triggers.expression: last(/BANCO DE DADOS/perf_counter["\Processor Information(_Total)\% Privileged Time"])>50
triggers.name: KERNEL TIME - AVERAGE

triggers.expression: last(/BANCO DE DADOS/perf_counter["\Processor Information(_Total)\% Privileged Time"])>70
triggers.name: KERNEL TIME - DISASTER

triggers.expression: last(/BANCO DE DADOS/perf_counter["\Processor Information(_Total)\% Privileged Time"])>60
triggers.name: KERNEL TIME - HIGH

triggers.expression: last(/BANCO DE DADOS/perf_counter["\Processor Information(_Total)\% Privileged Time"])>40
triggers.name: KERNEL TIME - WARNING

triggers.expression: last(/BANCO DE DADOS/perf_counter["\Processor Information(_Total)\% Processor Time"])>70
triggers.name: CPU AVERAGE

triggers.expression: last(/BANCO DE DADOS/perf_counter["\Processor Information(_Total)\% Processor Time"])>98
triggers.name: CPU DISASTER

triggers.expression: last(/BANCO DE DADOS/perf_counter["\Processor Information(_Total)\% Processor Time"])>95
triggers.name: CPU HIGH

triggers.expression: last(/BANCO DE DADOS/perf_counter["\Processor Information(_Total)\% Processor Time"])>85
triggers.name: CPU WARNING
